OptionChoice.name: StrataActive
OptionChoice.Comment: Controls whether Strata is active in the current dimension. By default, it is only active in the overworld. To disable for a specific dimension, set this to false in the CustomOreGen_Options.txt found in the dimension directory (preferably before visiting it).

OptionDisplayGroup.name: groupStrata
OptionDisplayGroup.Description: Enable/disable Strata rock formations, ore deposits, and other substances.

OptionChoice.name: StrataGenRocks
OptionChoice.Description: Generate Strata rock distributions in the default pattern.

OptionChoice.name: StrataGenSandOres
OptionChoice.Description: Generate Strata placer deposits (iron, tin, garnet). This is recommended if you disable vanilla iron.

OptionChoice.name: StrataGenVolcanic
OptionChoice.Description: Generate Strata volcanic ore deposits including alunite, ash, perlite, pumice, and zeolite, as well as fumaroles (volcanic pipes) with gypsum, halite, and realgar.

OptionChoice.name: StrataGenSerpVeins
OptionChoice.Description: Generate Strata serpentinite veins that are rich in soapstone, magnesite, chromite, and chrysotile.

OptionChoice.name: StrataGenLaterites
OptionChoice.Description: Generate Strata ore deposits in bogs and tropical lateritic soils (bauxite, limonite, garnierite).

OptionChoice.name: StrataGenIgVeins
OptionChoice.Description: Generate Strata ore veins in igneous rock (ilmenite, chromite, vermiculite, magnetite, chalcopyrite, ...).

OptionChoice.name: StrataGenIgIntrusion
OptionChoice.Description: Generate Strata igneous intrusions where mafic rock has penetrated the upper reaches of the crust. These contain large deposits of magnetite, magnesite, pentlandite, ilmenite, chromite, and vermiculite.

OptionChoice.name: StrataGenEvaporite
OptionChoice.Description: Generate Strata marine evaporite deposits rich in gypsum and rock salt.

OptionChoice.name: StrataGenBrines
OptionChoice.Description: Generate pools of water concentrated with salts.

OptionChoice.name: StrataGenBrineWells
OptionChoice.Description: Generate renewing wells of brine.

OptionChoice.name: StrataGenVMS
OptionChoice.Description: Generate Strata Volcagenic Massive Sulfide deposits, rich in sulfide ores like sphalerite, galena, and chalcopyrite.

OptionChoice.name: StrataGenSEDEX
OptionChoice.Description: Generate SEDimentary EXhalative deposits rich in sphalerite, galena, scheelite, and chalcopyrite.

OptionChoice.name: StrataGenPegmatite
OptionChoice.Description: Generate Strata pegmatite veins with a rich assortment of minerals.

OptionChoice.name: StrataGenCarbonate
OptionChoice.Description: Generate Strata carbonate deposits with minerals like magnesite, soapstone, wollastonite, sphalerite, and galena.

OptionChoice.name: StrataGenBarite
OptionChoice.Description: Generate Strata barite deposits.

OptionChoice.name: StrataGenMarine
OptionChoice.Description: Generate Strata marine-related deposits.

OptionChoice.name: StrataGenGraphite
OptionChoice.Description: Generate Strata graphite deposits in various patterns.

OptionChoice.name: StrataGenClay
OptionChoice.Description: Generate Strata mineral clay deposits, including bentonite, palygorskite, and kaolinite.

OptionChoice.name: StrataVanillaOverride
OptionChoice.Description: If Strata generates a vanilla ore, override the corresponding generation from vanilla or other mods. It is most efficient, but not necessary, to also (or alternatively) disable the COG generation of these ores, as well as generation options in mod configurations.

OptionChoice.name: StrataGenCoal
OptionChoice.Description: Generate Strata distributions of coal.

OptionChoice.name: StrataGenDiamond
OptionChoice.Description: Generate Strata distributions of diamonds.

OptionChoice.name: StrataGenEmerald
OptionChoice.Description: Generate Strata distributions of emeralds.

OptionChoice.name: StrataGenGold
OptionChoice.Description: Generate Strata distributions of gold.

OptionChoice.name: StrataGenIron
OptionChoice.Description: Generate Strata distributions of iron (hematite, magnetite).

OptionChoice.name: StrataGenBIF
OptionChoice.Description: Generate sedimentary banded iron formations, primarily of hematite, with some recoverable magnetite.

OptionChoice.name: StrataGenLapis
OptionChoice.Description: Generate Strata distributions of lapis lazuli.

OptionChoice.name: StrataGenRedstone
OptionChoice.Description: Generate Strata distributions of redstone.

OptionChoice.name: StrataOverride
OptionChoice.Description: If Strata generates a non-vanilla ore, override the corresponding generation from other mods. It is most efficient, but not necessary, to also (or alternatively) disable the COG generation of these ores, as well as generation options in mod configurations.

OptionChoice.name: StrataGenCopper
OptionChoice.Description: Generate Strata distributions of copper ore (chalcopyrite, malachite).

OptionChoice.name: StrataGenTin
OptionChoice.Description: Generate Strata distributions of tin ore (cassiterite).

OptionChoice.name: StrataGenAluminum
OptionChoice.Description: Generate Strata distributions of aluminium ore (bauxite).

OptionChoice.name: StrataGenMercury
OptionChoice.Description: Generate Strata distributions of mercury ore (cinnabar).

OptionChoice.name: StrataGenLeadZinc
OptionChoice.Description: Generate Strata distributions of zinc and lead ore (sphalerite, galena).

OptionChoice.name: StrataGenTungsten
OptionChoice.Description: Generate Strata distributions of tungsten ore (scheelite, wolframite).

OptionChoice.name: StrataGenNickel
OptionChoice.Description: Generate Strata distributions of nickel ore (pentlandite, garnierite).

OptionChoice.name: StrataGenChromium
OptionChoice.Description: Generate Strata distributions of chromium ore (chromite).

OptionChoice.name: StrataGenTitanium
OptionChoice.Description: Generate Strata distributions of titanium ore (ilmenite).

OptionChoice.name: StrataGenMolybdenum
OptionChoice.Description: Generate Strata distributions of molybdenum ore (molybdenite).

OptionChoice.name: StrataGenManganese
OptionChoice.Description: Generate Strata distributions of manganese ore (pyrolusite).

OptionChoice.name: StrataGenMagnesium
OptionChoice.Description: Generate Strata distributions of magnesium ore (dolomite, magnesite).

OptionChoice.name: StrataGenUranium
OptionChoice.Description: Generate Strata distributions of uranium ore (uraninite).

OptionChoice.name: StrataGenApatite
OptionChoice.Description: Generate Strata distributions of apatite (phosphate ore).

OptionChoice.name: StrataGenSalt
OptionChoice.Description: Generate Strata distributions of salt ore (halite).

OptionChoice.name: StrataGenQuartz
OptionChoice.Description: Generate Strata distributions of quartz and associated minerals.

OptionChoice.name: StrataGenPetroleum
OptionChoice.Description: Generate petroleum resources, including crude oil (four types), oil sand, oil shale, and natural gas.

SubstitutePreset.name: PresetPrimaryStratumContinental
SubstitutePreset.Description: The continental crust is fundamentally different from the oceanic crust, and from volcanic regions. It is formed via plate subduction, where water from the ocean is intermixed, causing partial melting and the formation of felsic igneous rock (granite). Also, there is more substantial accumulation of sediment relative to the ocean.

SubstitutePreset.name: PresetPrimaryStratumOceanic
SubstitutePreset.Description: The ocean crust is formed from partial melting of peridotite from the mantel. This results in gabbro intrusions and extrusions in the form of basalt. Islands are formed from accumulation of basalt.

SubstitutePreset.name: PresetPrimaryStratumVolcanic
SubstitutePreset.Description: Numerous igneous intrusions will be found beneath volcanoes. These volcanoes are assumed to be formed in subduction zones, so they will be layered with felsic extrusions, like rhyolite and andesite.

CloudPreset.name: PresetStratum
CloudPreset.Description: Solid clouds that form layers of rock and minerals. Individual layer generators are expected to modify CloudHeight, CouldThickness, and DistributionFrequency settings.

VeinsPreset.name: PresetRockVeins
VeinsPreset.Description: Thick veins of rock, usually formed through hydrothermal processes.

ConfigSection.Description: Igneous rocks are either intrusive (from magma) or extrusive (from lava). There is a range of silicate content, denoted by the terms mafic, intermediate, and felsic in increasing order. Extrusive rocks will be limited to volcanic regions, i.e, islands and the extreme hills. Islands consist of mafic basalt, and one will find only the more felsic andesite and rhyolite in the mountains. Igneous intrusions lay deep under the surface of every biome.

Sedimentary rocks include mudstone, claystone, limestone, conglomerate/breccia, and sandstone, among others that we exclude for simplicity. These will be deposited everywhere except the volcanic zones.

Metamorphic rock has been formed from other rock. The changes are usually brought about through high temperature and pressure. A combination of these converts sedimentary rocks to slate, then schist, and finally gneiss. Increased temperature due to magma contact forms marble, hornfel, and quartzite. Pegmatite and serpentinite are created through hydrothermal activity.
